TopicTitle: [GAME!] Describe the person above you in one sentence

Articles.Content: The person above is a Noob, but is miniature, and therefore is a Nooblet.
The person above Is andreas
Rock on.

The person above is related to the reason why Jeb has not shot a rock at Kerbin from deep space.

NINJA\'d.
The above forum user is a ninja.
The person above should realize that I meant that my post was beaten to the post button.
The person above does not realise that I don\'t realise that he meant his post 'was beaten to the post button'.
The above person is using albeit butchering-ly so, the sentence starter, 'The above person,' which I created on page 3.
Radion is in the habit of creating phrases to start this topic.
someone who has a trait everyone should have: Not caring.

The above person is someone whom I presume has the 'caring' trait, otherwise he would not have cared to post at all, leaving a blank void for the rest of eternity which no one will step forward to close, unless of course someone does step up to close, in which case the closer will leave an even larger void when he/she finishes closing and leaves to close yet another void, creating more, essentially dooming us all to an endless amount of voids, all of them going on for eternity without someone to close them, yet those closers are also the ones creating more voids, starting the cycle yet again, meaning that the entire planet will one day be consumed in a large void of nothingness unbeatable by those upon whom we have relied to close our gaps, yet they no longer can due to the sheer enormity of the voids which they must clear, and now I come to the realization that my post has probably exceeded the character count, as such I should stop typing, yet I cannot, but I must.
The above person likes writing sentences considered to 'run on.'
Why does everyone make me feel stupid.
someone stupid.
Someone who just scored an easy post.
Someone who is me...
Someone who has gone mad.
A person who posted 3 times on the same game.
Someone who is apparently a creeper due to his name.
Aperture Science test subject.
A sniper
Made of bad spelling.
Critical. ;D
Rocketry enthusiast.
The above person has over 900.0 posts.
